\n Test for Accounting module main listbox worklow actions\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n Accounting Transaction Module Workflow Actions\n
open${base_url}/AccountingZuite_markChanged
verifyTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}
selectAndWaitselect_moduleAccounting
clickAndWaitFolder_show:method
type//tr[@id=\'listbox_search_line\']/td[2]/span/inputClient 1 Sale Invoice
clickAndWaitlistbox_select
verifyTextlistbox_record_number1 record(s)
selectAndWaitselect_actionlabel=Validate Transactions
clickAndWait//input[@id=\'dialog_submit_button\']
assertPortalStatusMessageWorkflow modification in progress for 1 out of 1
clickAndWaitFolder_show:method
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_3\']/td[8]Draft
open${base_url}/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/accounting_module/view
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[8]Stopped
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_3\']/td[8]Draft
clickAndWaitFolder_show:method
click//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[1]/input
click//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[1]/input
selectAndWaitselect_actionlabel=Validate Transactions
clickAndWait//input[@id=\'dialog_submit_button\']
assertPortalStatusMessageWorkflow modification in progress for 1 out of 2
clickAndWaitFolder_show:method
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[8]Stopped
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_3\']/td[8]Draft
open${base_url}/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/accounting_module/view
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[8]Stopped
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[8]Stopped
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_2\']/td[8]Draft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_3\']/td[8]Draft
\n \n \n
